vallibrary.datatype
Class MeasureVector

java.lang.Object
  vallibrary.datatype.MeasureVector

public class MeasureVector
extends java.lang.Object

The Measure_Vector class provides an object containing method and information concerning measure values.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Raffaele Giancarlo, Davide Scaturro, Filippo Utro
